page.title: 20LIFESTYLES - BURGHFIELD
page.content: The name of the person we interviewed was Mrs. Lambourne. Her address is in Kingshill. She used to be in the war as a WAAF then she was a hairdresser but now she is a housewife. Her husband was an ROF Fire Officer and he is now retired and she has been living in Burghfield for sixty-two and a half years. Her hobbies are walking, knitting, theatre and looking after children. She shops at Savacentre and Waitrose (Meadway). She does not use public transport very often. She likes the area a lot. She thinks it is a good place for a family. She thinks the Berkshire County Council should keep the hedges, verges and roads in better condition.
